input.rewritten_query: 查询2025-2026-1学期各班平均分排名前5

output.sql: WITH class_avg_scores AS (SELECT class.class_name, AVG(score.score_value) AS avg_score FROM score JOIN course_class ON score.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN class ON course_class.class_id = class.id WHERE score.term = '2025-2026-1' AND score.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY class.class_name) SELECT class_name, avg_score FROM class_avg_scores ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 5

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“学期（如 2025-2026-1）”及别名“学期”“学年学期”映射；同时 course_class.term 也具备相同描述，但 score 表是成绩事实主表，且任务中 filters 明确指定 score.term，故优先映射至 score.term
